name: PassKit
title: PassKit

api_list.name: Get Unique Pass Id (by share id)

required_parameters.name: shareid
required_parameters.description: The PassKit ShareID that you wish to get the Unique Pass ID for

api_list.name: Get Pass Details (by template and serial)
List Templates
api_list.description: This method returns all the templates for the user account (API key & secret). More info at: https://code.google.com/p/passkit/wiki/ListTemplates
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://passkit-passkit.p.rapidapi.com/template/list"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "passkit-passkit.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
api_list.convert_code:
import requests

url = "https://passkit-passkit.p.rapidapi.com/template/list"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",

print(response.json())

api_list.name: Get Image Data
api_list.description: This method returns data about a particular imageID, specifically te useage types that it has been processed for. More info at: https://code.google.com/p/passkit/wiki/GetImageData

api_list.name: Authenticate
api_list.description: Authenticates access to the API. IMPORTANT: You will need to pair your PassKit API Key and Secret with your Mashape username BEFORE you can use this or any other method via mashape.  To do this, use a browser to visit https://api.passkit.com/v1/mashape/{mashape username} (replace {mashape username} with your username); 2. Authenticate with your PassKit API KEY and API SECRET; if you are successful then you will receive a JSON response in your browser window, then you can test everything is working by clicking the "Test Endpoint" button for this method.  For more info: https://code.google.com/p/passkit/wiki/Authenticate
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://passkit-passkit.p.rapidapi.com/authenticate"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "passkit-passkit.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())

api_list.name: Get Pass Details (by pass id)
api_list.description: Retrieves the pass details by Pass ID
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://passkit-passkit.p.rapidapi.com/pass/get/passid/aB12Cd34Ef56"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "passkit-passkit.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
api_list.convert_code:
import requests

url = "https://passkit-passkit.p.rapidapi.com/pass/get/passid/{passid}"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "passkit-passkit.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())

api_list.name: Get Template Field Names (full)
api_list.description: This method returns the full field names that can be used with the Issue Pass and Update Pass methods for a particular template. More info: https://code.google.com/p/passkit/wiki/GetTemplateDetails

required_parameters.name: templatename
required_parameters.description: The name of the template that you wish to retrieve the fieldnames for

api_list.name: Get Template Field Names
api_list.description: This method returns the field names that can be used with the Issue Pass and Update Pass methods for a particular template. More info: https://code.google.com/p/passkit/wiki/GetTemplateDetails

required_parameters.name: templatename
required_parameters.description: The name of the template that you wish to retrieve the field names for

api_list.name: Upload Image (by URL)
api_list.description: Same as Upload Image method, only instead of uploading image, you can use an image URL.

required_parameters.name: url
required_parameters.description: The URL to the image you wish to add

required_parameters.name: imagetype
required_parameters.description: The Image Type (strip, icon, logo, thumbnail, background, footer)

api_list.name: Get Passes For Template
api_list.description: This method returns some basic template information and all the passes for the template (pass meta -and field data). More information at: https://code.google.com/p/passkit/wiki/GetPassesForTemplate

required_parameters.name: templatename
required_parameters.description: The name of the template that you wish to retrieve the passes for

optional_parameters.name: nextToken
optional_parameters.description: If the number of passes are to many to returned in one request, a nextToken will be returned in the response.  If an optional nextToken parameter is supplied then the records returned will be from that point.
